title: Ketu Transit in the 6th House for Aries Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting your 6th house creates detachment from routine struggles, competition, and daily conflicts. This phase weakens the urge to dominate rivals or prove strength through constant effort. Work and service feel duty-based rather than ambition-driven, while health requires mindful attention due to neglect or irregular habits. Although motivation to fight obstacles reduces, Ketu sharpens problem awareness and karmic resolution. When handled consciously, this transit supports silent victories, healing patterns, and release from repetitive stress cycles.

sections.heading: Work & Service
points: Reduced desire to compete at the workplace
Work performed out of duty, not ambition
Lower attachment to daily task recognition

closing: Ketu in the 6th house dissolves the need to fight every battle. Conscious responsibility turns detachment into healing strength.
